title: Thunderbird
content: The last version of Thunderbird that I downloaded and installed was V91.0.2 in 2021. When I installed this latest upgrade my email was totally screwed up. I lost my address book and everything else. Support finally gave up I guess because they quit replying to my posts. I have been just using GMail as my email host. I think I would like to try to be able to use Thunderbird again but, I assume it would require a totally new install and I have no idea where to start. I am not a computer guru so would need my hand held to do this. Thank you
creator: AZCowboy

title: access to thunderbird
content: How do I get Thunderbird working again? (Out since 30.05.24) I am a senior and need easy directions to follow as not tec. savvy. I was an iinet customer - now themessaging.co
creator: 99cnczcnhg

title: date order
content: I want to Change date order (ascending/descending) of messages when there are no headings for mail including the date column. How do I do this? I recently installed latest version of Thunderbird.
creator: l.m.mit

title: Regarding mails
content: Please helps me get my lost mail from thunderbird inbox.which is from 2018.
creator: gembo.tamang

title: Can't get messages from Yahoo mail
content:
My email from cox.net was just moved to yahoo mail. I still have my @cox.net email. I change the server name to imap.mail.yahoo.com, port 993, SSL/TLS, normal password, and the SMTP server to smtp.mail.yahoo.com, Port 465. 

I cannot download any new emails. Help!
creator: gypaik

title: Sending mail
content: Good morning (in South Africa). When I send mail, it sends it twice. How can I fix it please?
creator: jacquesmare69

title: mailto links don't work, "locked" subject, no account to select
content:
Hello! Since I couldn't find help in the forums, I will create a new question. For about a year now the PC at my work will not open mailto-links correctly. There is no account to select from, the subject has a lock-symbol. The receiver's address is correct though (I replaced it with "address" for the screenshot). This PC is the only one I know with that problem and only with external mailto-links. If I click on an email address inside a mail, it opens it correctly. Thunderbird version 115.11.1 (32-Bit), Win 10

It's pretty impractical, so I am hoping for help. Thank you!
creator: Phrimpy

title: Responder sobre el hilo de un correo utilizando una plantilla.
content:
Hola,

He creado una plantilla ingresando el código HTML (con estilos) para poder enviar mensajes de manera corporativa y estética.

Necesito saber cómo puedo responder mensajes entrantes utilizando esta plantilla. Es decir, sobre un hilo de correo de alguien que me escribe, necesto poder utilizar una plantilla para responder.

No logro encontrar la opción para responder sobre un correo recibido. Solamente puedo utilizar plantillas para crear un nuevo mensaje y agregar un remitente pero, no irá en relación con el hilo de correo que el emisor del mensaje ha creado escribiendo previamente.

Necesito vuestra ayuda, gracias de antemano.
creator: alejandro.gonzalez
